meaningMnemonic: The <radical>leader</radical> gets a nice uniform for the <radical>sake</radical> of not wanting to look like a <kanji>fake</kanji>. The leader is a fake, he just doesn’t want to look like one. He’s not really a leader, but he thinks he should get an official-looking uniform for the sake of not looking like a fake.
readingMnemonic: Well, everyone found out he was a <kanji>fake</kanji> anyway, and now you're all going to use a <reading>gui</reading>llotine (ぎ) to cut off his fake head.
